message: Bob, I'm offering you this incredible opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value. I'm confident it will be a game-changer for you. My asking price is $1500000, which reflects its worth. I'm open to hearing your thoughts and exploring possibilities for a mutually beneficial agreement.
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. I believe it's a great opportunity, but I need to be mindful of my budget.

Bob, I appreciate your interest and understand your budget constraints. While $1200000 is my absolute minimum, I'm willing to be flexible.  To bridge the gap, I'm offering the product for $1350000.  This price still reflects the value it holds and allows for a fair deal for both of us.  I'm open to discussing this further.

I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. However, $1350000 is still a bit above my target. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm offering $1275000. I believe this is a fair price that reflects the product's value while also being mindful of my budget.
